author: mrglavas
msg: Allow the SAXParser to recognize these configurations as
supporting XML 1.1. Also some identation cleanup.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding two new parser configurations analogous to

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding an interface to allow parser configurations which aren't
subclasses of XML11Configuration to be recognized as
supporting XML 1.1 by the SAX parser.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding an error message for elements other than xi:include
from the XInclude namespace which appear on xi:fallback.
